description:
Rocksteady Studios’ Suicide Squad game is officially coming to its end. The fourth season of Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League will welcome a new playable character, Deathstroke, to the game, and “will mark the final battle against Brainiac,” the developer said Monday on the game’s official website.

Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League’s next update will also bring with it the game’s long-promised offline mode, though
title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League’s fourth season will be its last

description:
You’ll reach the Fountain of Confession in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle as you progress “The Stolen Cat Mummy” adventure. Once you reach the fountain, you’ll have to solve a puzzle to open a secret door, and then solve more puzzles to get inside.

The first puzzle involves three dragon statues at the Fountain of Confession itself. Once you solve that one
title: How to solve the Fountain of Confession puzzles in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

description: The Game Awards is simultaneously an awards show and a trailer extravaganza in which game studios and publishers show off their upcoming slates. Some of these trailers are for games that have already been announced; others are what TGA host Geoff Keighley calls “world premieres.” We already know from official announcements about what’s confirmed to show up, but we also have some informed guesses as to what t
title: What we think will get announced at the Game Awards 2024

description:
I picked up Marvel Rivals because it’s popular with my pals and free-to-play, but I’m not much of a Marvel buff. I know my Black Widows from my Winter Soldiers, but characters like Magik, Luna Snow, and Adam Warlock are new to me. There’s one hero in particular I was delighted to discover: Jeff the Land Shark, who’s just a little guy I absolutely adore. In a roster full of superpowered badasses, I’m obsessed with Jeff — and I’m not alone.

Jeff the Land Shark is a relatively new hero, especially considering some of Marvel Rivals’ cast date back decades. He’s a baby shark with short little legs, big googly eyes, and a too
title: Marvel Rivals is teaching everyone about the joy of Jeff The Land Shark

description: Disney Lorcana’s seventh set of cards is titled Archazia’s Island, and will feature characters from Disney’s Aladdin, Lilo and Stitch, and Bolt. The full-sized set of more than 200 cards was announced over the weekend, during the first-ever European Championship in Disneyland Paris. The new set debuts in March 2025 alongside, and a “Gift Box” featuring Lilo and some handy card dividers. Publisher Ravensburger also teased a release of the Reign of Jafar<
title: Disney Lorcana reveals new releases featuring Lilo, Bolt, and Jafar

description:
The Swan Gazebo is a beautiful photospot in Infinity Nikki that you’ll want to find the complete the “Wishfield Journal” event challenge, but it’s not really marked on the map, making it hard to find. Labeled as “Finding Romance” on the event page, you’ll need to take a picture in the gazebo to earn the travel insight points.

Below, we explain where to find the Swan Gazebo in Infinity Nikki<
title: Where to find the Swan Gazebo in Infinity Nikki

description:
The ranked mode for Marvel Rivals is formally called the competitive queue, and. Here, you can really test your mettle and prove yourself against your fellow players. But Marvel Rivals’ ranked mode isn’t immediately accessible when you first start playing.

In this Marvel Rivals guide, we’ll walk you through how to unlock ranked mode, how the competitive queue works, and what you get for participating in
title: How to unlock ranked in Marvel Rivals

description:
Aromalilies are a harvestable flower in Infinity Nikki needed to craft some clothes. While you can track the locations of plants you’ve seen in-game, if you haven’t found an Aromalily yet, you may feel out of luck.

Below we list an early location to find Aromalillies in Infinity Nikki, as well as explain what to use them for.

Where to find Aromalily in Infinity Nikki

Aromalilies are fl
title: Where to find Aromalily in Infinity Nikki

description:
“A Date to Remember” is a mystery you’ll find in the Museum Wing of Indiana Jones and the Great Circle’s Vatican. You’ll find a locked chest in a fascist tent in the area’s hedge garden(?).

Our Indiana Jones and the Great Circle “A Date to Remember” guide will show you how to find the chest combination for “A Date to Remember.”
title: Where to find the ‘A Date to Remember’ code in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

description:
“Father and Son” is a mystery you’ll uncover in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle once you rescue Giuliana from the Blackshirts. She’ll give you a key — Giuliana’s Key — that unlocks a secret room in Borgia Tower.

Our Indiana Jones and the Great Circle guide will show you how to find the safe combination for “Father and Son.”
title: Where to find the ‘Father and Son’ code in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

description: If you missed out on Humble’s excellent, affordable collection of digital board games a few months ago when we wrote about it, you now have another shot at picking it up. Through Dec 10 at 9 p.m. EST, you can get this $18 bundle that includes the digital versions of some of our
title: One of Humble’s best board game bundle is back for one day only

description: Battle Masters, the cult-classic tabletop wargame best known for taking over entire kitchen floors in the mid-1990s, will be brought back to life by Restoration Games (Fireball Island: Curse of Vul-Kar, Return to Dark Tower, Crossbows & Catapults: Fortress War) as Battle Monsters. The reboot is produce
title: Battle Masters board game reboot puts Godzilla on the front lines

description:
You can respec in Path of Exile 2, a process that allows you to refund your passive skill tree points

The massive and winding skill tree of Path of Exile 2 will leave you with a seemingly limitless amount of choices to make when designing your builds. It’s very easy to get lost and choose passive skills that might not be as optimal for your build, which is why respeccing is so vital.

Here’s when you unlock respec and how to respec in Path of Exile 2.
title: How to respec in Path of Exile 2

description:
Those who unintentionally made accidental purchases in Fortnite years ago are finally due for some compensation.

The Federal Trade Commission is forcing Fortnite creator Epic Games to pay more than $72 million in refunds to roughly 629,000 customers on Monday. Each affected person will get around $114 from the FTC if they successfully filed a claim. The payments follow a 2022 settlement where the federal agency alleged Epic Games “tricked” users into spending money on the p
title: Epic Games forced to pay hundreds of thousands of Fortnite players $100

description:
Marvel Rivals not only awards the standard MVP at the end of each match, it also declares someone the SVP — a mysterious title that the game never fully explains.

In this Marvel Rivals guide, we’ll walk you through what the SVP award means and how you can earn it on your team.

What is the SVP in Marvel Rivals?

SVP stands for Secon
title: What is the SVP in Marvel Rivals?

description:
“A Free Spirit” is a mystery you’ll find in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle. You’ll need to find and photograph a black cat named Signor Smushki, skulking somewhere around the Vatican (or, ahem, the Catican).

Our Indiana Jones and the Great Circle guide will show you how to complete “A Free Spirit” but showing you exa
title: Where to find the ‘Free Spirit’ cat in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

description:
Calm Thoughts are a material needed to evolve your outfits in Infinity Nikki, but where do you get them? These somewhat rare drops are only obtained from running a specific type of realm via warp spires, but you’ll have to play quite a bit of the story to unlock it.

Below, we explain where to get Calm Thoughts in Infinity Nikki and what Calm Thoughts are used for.

How to get Calm Thoughts in Infinity Nikki
title: How to get Calm Thoughts in Infinity Nikki

description:
A mobile version of Final Fantasy 14 is currently in development, and we now have our first look at the MMO’s upcoming port.

The footage, first uploaded by a verified account for the game to Chinese video sharing site Bilibili, features brief gameplay snippets of Final Fantasy 14 Mobile’s nine initial jobs — Warrior, Paladin, Bard, Black Mage, Summoner, Monk, Dragoon, Scholar, and White Mage — performing some basic actions in combat against rand
title: Final Fantasy 14 Mobile’s first gameplay footage looks pretty dang clean

description:
The days are short, cold, and far too packed with things to do. So let me help by adding a bit more to your to-do list this week with some television to add to your schedule.

Don’t worry, it doesn’t all have to be appointment (what is streaming good for, if not setting your own appointment TV viewing times?). It can be a little more leisurely and fit into your schedule — hopefully no one is spoiling Great British Baking Show’s holiday specials for you. (And if there is someone in your life like that: Don’t worry, the ghosts of Christmas specials past will be knocking soon.)
title: Netflix’s Great British Baking Show holiday specials, Secret Level, and more new TV this week

description: Last week, a masked shooter killed UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson outside of a Manhattan hotel. Thompson’s wife said he had received threats potentially related to “a lack of coverage.” UnitedHealthcare reportedly uses “a faulty artificial intelligence algorithm to deny elderly patients coverage,“ according to CBS News, and denies coverage to chronically ill patients, per
title: Someone recreated the UnitedHealthcare CEO shooting in Cruelty Squad

description:
Just a few months after CD Projekt Red announced it was done updating Cyberpunk 2077, the studio is readying yet another Cyberpunk 2077 update. The details of the patch will be shared during a special live stream on Dec. 10.

While we don’t yet know what exactly Cyberpunk 2077 Update 2.2 will include, CD Projekt Red global community director Marcin Momot was explicit about PlayStation 5 Pro support and new game plus
title: Cyberpunk 2077 gets surprise update — but it won’t include new game plus, PS5 Pro support

description: One of the best deals of Black Friday and Cyber Monday has returned. Both variants of the Asus ROG Ally Windows-based handheld gaming PCs are back on sale for their lowest prices yet, including the faster version with its Z1 Extreme processor and the more affordable version with the standard Z1 CPU. Prices start at $349.99 (was $499.99) at Best Buy. For the faster version, the cost goes up to $499.99 at Best Buy (was $649.99). In terms of screen quality, you can’t go wrong with either model, as t
title: The Asus ROG Ally handheld is back down to its lowest price

description:
One of the biggest collaborations in gaming gets even bigger on Dec. 12 with the launch of Lego Fortnite Brick Life, which looks a lot like Grand Theft Auto Online if its target demographic was 6-year-olds.

A short video released alongside Monday’s announcement depicts popular Fortnite characters like Banana Guy, Fish Man, and Pink Bear Lady (these may not be their actual names) hanging out in a fully Lego world. They speed down crowded city streets on souped-up, neon motorcycles, they pull off elaborate treasure heis
title: Lego Fortnite’s new ‘social roleplay experience’ looks like a cute GTA Online

description:
2024 has been… a year. But at the end of the day, there was plenty to sink our teeth into.

We were delighted by the platforming possibilities in Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown and Astro Bot, and the rich storytelling of RPGs like
title: Polygon’s Best of 2024

description: About 25 years ago, the production team on Peter Jackson’s Lord of the Rings trilogy put out an open call for any able-bodied horse rider willing to truck themselves and a horse out to a remote New Zealand shoot to become an extra in the legendary cavalry of Rohan. Stop me if you’ve heard this one before, but the production did not expect
title: War of the Rohirrim revives everything great about Peter Jackson’s Lord of the Rings

description:
itch.io spent hours completely offline on Sunday night — and the indie game marketplace placed the blame on an automated takedown generated on behalf of Funko, maker of the Funko Pop collectable figurines.

“I kid you not, @itchio has been taken down by @OriginalFunko,” the site posted to X in the early hours of Monday morning. itch.io said Funko uses “some trash ‘AI Powered’ Brand Protection Software” that generated a “bogus Phishing report” a
title: itch.io says it was taken down by Funko
